text: Damco Solutions is a global technology company, specializing in digital transformation, IT services, and business consulting, with a focus on artificial intelligence (AI), cloud computing, and low-code development. The company currently operates five offices worldwide, including locations in the United States, India, Luxembourg, and the United Arab Emirates. == History == Damco Solutions was founded on May 1, 1996, in Faridabad, Haryana, India, by Mohit Gupta and Dimple Gupta, working on Y2K projects. Over the years, the company has expanded its operations globally, providing services to clients in North America, the United Kingdom and Europe, and the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) region. By 1999, the company diversified its offerings across various technology stacks, and in 2001, it opened its first international delivery centers in the United States and the United Kingdom. In 2012, Damco enhanced its process orientation and achieved ISO certification. In 2015, the company adopted an industry-specific strategy, focusing initially on the insurance sector. By 2020, Damco repositioned itself as a digital transformation partner, investing in AI and strategy consulting services. Damco was named a Great Place to Work for 2023–2024 and 2024–2025, and was featured in Everest Group’s 2024 PEAK Matrix Assessment for low-code application development services. == References ==
title: Damco
